lines.text: You know, I had a boy like you once. He was as ugly as dirt... took after his ma. I ended up having to slit his throat.
Ol' B'ar Killer he wouldn't kill nobody. B'ars and injuns, maybe a white kid or two.
Well in all my born put-together, I never seen nothin' like this off no indian - talking about the gold headband Sam found
Nothin' purdier than sweeeet yeller gold.

[singing]
I killed a b'ar, over thar. I didn't really do it, I was drunk.
